## Research Quality Checklist

- [ ] All sources properly cited
- [ ] Key claims verified across multiple sources
- [ ] Publication dates checked and noted
- [ ] Author credentials evaluated
- [ ] Bias and limitations considered
- [ ] Conflicting information documented
- [ ] Primary vs. secondary sources distinguished
- [ ] All quotes verified and attributed
